name: Dire Island
description:
As the unexpected storm shattered your boat, your team found themselves marooned on Dire Island. United in the pursuit of survival, you must now navigate the enigmatic challenges that lie ahead, unraveling the island's hidden secrets and forging bonds in the crucible of adversity.
Fighting
Fight against the dire of strange island.
Survival
Explore, hunting animal, gather food/item during the day. Defend or stay low at night with a campfire and barricade house.
Use stealth to evade enemies, or hunting them directly with whatever weapon you have.
Co-op
Cooperate with friends to Survival, Explore and Adventure together!
